ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Right-click effects on armour
ygData.msgSnippet: A suggestion like that to the eq boards would almost certainly be implemented, I think, and easily.  Give it a try!  :) Atonal ... From: firehawk@cloud9.net
ygData.messageBody:
A suggestion like that to the eq boards would almost certainly be
implemented, I think, and easily. Give it a try! :)

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: firehawk@... [mailto:firehawk@...]
Sent: Monday, June 04, 2001 10:51 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Right-click effects on armour


Talies it's static effect times. problem is they aren;t standard.

SS arms give invigor about 30 sec

ss boots give aria of eagles 5 min levitate.

ss breast plate gave 30sec song of travel don't know what it is currently.\



The really stupid part is the message is X piece glows. Would it have hurt
to say sings? hums, heck even rattles?



On Mon, 04 Jun 2001 09:16:35 -0500 eqbards@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> I was just looking around and noticing that there are certain effects on

> Bard armour that... well.. confuse me.

>

> Resonant / Melodic breastplates both bear the effect Selo's Song of

> Travel. How does this work? Does it stay "clicked" until you zone or
does

> it last a certain amount of time? I'd really hate to have to start

> twisting armour ;)

>

> Talies the Wanderer

>

>

> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...

> with the subject submissions.
